scripts.migrate: rm -rf ./extensions/migrations/* && mkdir -p ./extensions/migrations/ && cp -rp ./src/extensions/migrations/* ./extensions/migrations/ && cp -p ./src/extensions/migration-utils.js ./extensions/ && dotenv -- pnpm dlx directus@11.1.1 database migrate:latest
scripts.schema:apply: pnpm dlx directus@11.1.1 schema apply --yes snapshots/collections-schema.yml
scripts.schema:snapshot: pnpm dlx directus@11.1.1 schema snapshot --yes snapshots/collections-schema.yml
scripts.prepare: husky install || echo 'Failed to install husky'; rm -f .eslintcache
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:e2e:build:directus && npm run test:e2e:build:dash && npm run test:e2e:run
scripts.test:e2e:build:directus: docker compose -f docker-compose.e2e.yml up --build -d && pnpm run init:e2e && docker compose -f docker-compose.e2e.yml stop
scripts.test:e2e:build:dash: git clone -b e2e https://github.com/jsdelivr/globalping-dash.git test/e2e/globalping-dash; cd test/e2e/globalping-dash && git add . && git reset --hard && git pull --force && pnpm install --ignore-workspace && dotenv -e ../../../.env -- pnpm build && cd ../../../;
